comments.body: (I personally prefer `i += 1`, but that's not a Flutter style issue. Feel free to leave it as `++i`.)
You learned loops from python, didn't you... I'm a C++ guy, so `++i` is the right answer. :-)

I learnt from Pascal, where it's spelt `Inc(Index);`. :-)

I'm averse to `++i` because it looks like an expression but is a statement with an effect. In general I prefer expressions to be side-effect free, because side-effects are a bug factory.
